EmailTemplate.name: 9b.5 Feedback to summer staff: Invite to apply for different role
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback from your role this summer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Many thanks for all of your work for NCS with The Challenge. Following the feedback received on your performance, we would like to invite you to apply for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Recommendation_for_next_year__c} for 2014.
We feel that it is important to continue to improve our roles year on year; and in order to improve the quality of our programme, changes have been made to some of the roles so we will require an assessment for you to apply for this position.*
Please follow the link and complete an application form fully and put in any information that would be relevant to that role. An assessment date will be sent to you in due course.
http://thechallenge.force.com/TCN/New_Job_Application
Thank you for your ongoing interest in NCS with The Challenge. Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} CR 9.5
*Please note the Community Mentor role is now called Community Facilitator.
